document_data.name: ''Symbol of Tyr''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''symbol of Tyr''''' was an [[enchanted]] defensive bracelet of the [[Tyr]]ran faith in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: A ''symbol of Tyr'' was a metallic piece of jewelry, decorated with red [[gem]]s and a disk, decorated with Tyr's ''[[holy symbol]]'', proudly announcing the wearer's devotion to the God of Justice.
document_data.Powers: The enchantments placed on these bracelets magically reflected partial damage dealt to the wearer back onto the attacker.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nayeli Goldflower]]: a [[paladin]] from the city of [[Daggerford]] and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
